audioText: Les marchands vendent leurs produits artisanaux locaux sur la place du marché traditionnel chaque samedi matin.
question: When do the merchants sell their local artisanal products?
options: Every Saturday morning at the traditional market square
Daily except Sunday at the town center
Only during summer festivals and holidays
Twice a week at different locations in town
explanation: The text states 'Les marchands vendent leurs produits artisanaux locaux sur la place du marché traditionnel chaque samedi matin.' - The merchants sell their local artisanal products at the traditional market square every Saturday morning. 'Vendent' is the third person plural present form of 'vendre' (to sell).
